title: Pawan Kalyan 'Dharna' in Tamil Nadu for Telugu language
title_page: Pawan Kalyan 'Dharna' in Tamil Nadu for Telugu language - TeluguPeople.com News
text:
Pawan Kalyan 'Dharna' in Tamil Nadu for Telugu language
Jana Sena chief and power star' Pawan Kalyan is now keen on questioning the Tamil Nadu government. Recently Tamil Nadu government imposed ban on Telugu medum schools in th estate. It decided to close down Telugu medium schools in the State under the garb of implementing 'compulsory Tamil'.
The government passed a Nirbandha Tamilam GO and with this so many Telugus who have been staying there since many years are distanced from learning their mother tongue Telugu. The decision of Amma is now evoking uproars from telugu's.
Tamil Nadu Telugu Yuva Shakti organisation recently staged a protest in Hyderabad opposing the move of Tamil Nadu government. Now as per reports Pawan Kalyan extended his party support to them and he' will be participating in a dharna in Hosur of Tamil Nadu state. Also there is a talk in film nagar that Pawan might also meet Tamil Nadu CM Amma Jayalalitha regarding the issue.
'
News Posted: 16 September, 2015
